events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on May 9th, requesting to start the insurance claim process immediately.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords detected in the initial report mentioning car and collision.
An agent with specialization in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle the case for quick resolution.
Acknowledgement of claim submission sent to customer along with detailed instructions for next steps in the process.
Requested copies of police report, vehicle registration, and photographs from the scene to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photos within the given timeframe.
Investigation team has started review of submitted documents and will inspect vehicle damages and related factors.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident details and verifying the extent of damages to the vehicle.
A settlement amount has been proposed to the customer based on the investigation findings and policy coverage.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with how the claim was handled.
Claim officially approved for the settlement amount, allowing financial processing to begin promptly.
Payment has been issued and transferred to the customer's account as per the approved settlement.
Claim case successfully closed after completion of payment and confirmation from customer on settlement.
All claim-related documents and messages have been archived for record-keeping and future reference.
